div.p: This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: National Drug Code (NDC). The US Federal Drug Administration (FDA) Data Standards Council assigns the first 5 digits of the 11 digit code. NCPDP field # 407-D7.

copyright.value: NDC codes are available for use. As HL7 is working with the owning authority to finalize the url, this url is subject to change
